name: Falling Star (SaikingS)
description: Falling Star It is said that hundreds of stars fall from space every minute... And now a young and brave star has fallen from its place, forced to undertake the journey of its life... That star is you! Collect stardust on your adventure through the cosmos and progress through a group of planets, all while avoiding obstacles, dangerous space-born fauna, and find your way home! Game by Kettu Games Game Creator: SaikingS Music Composor: Valentino Cervini Dialogue Corrector: Winter Wolff
